instructions: Put the dinner fork to the bottom left with the prong facing up
Put the knife on the bottom right side with the blade facing up
Put the salad fork next to the dinner fork on the left side
Put the salad knife next to the dinner knife to the right with the blade facing up
Put the soup spoon next to the salad knife on the right with the bowl facing up
Put the dessert spoon in the center at the top with the bowl facing left
Move the dessert spoon next to the soup spoon on the right with the bowl facing up
Move the dessert spoon to the top center with the bowl facing left
Put the dinner place in the bottom center between the dinner fork and the dinner knife
Put the bread plate in the top left above the forks and to the left of the dessert spoon
Put the butter knife on the bread plate with the blade facing 45 degrees southwest
Put the wine glass above the soup spoon
Put the water glass to the right of the dessert spoon
Put the napkin in the middle of the dinner plate
